A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Equal parts familiar and different\, this is a different Star Wars for a different world\, but with enough typically Star Wars-ian tropes to fit in the Star Wars universe.

It?ll definitely be a marmite movie in that people will either really like it or hate it. There is certainly a lot more humour than the recent Star Wars movies (and yes Star Wars always has been full of humour)\, but this humour helps to relieve and add a counter point to the dark stuff that also happens. 

After watching it\, leaving the cinema talking to my friends I couldn?t think of words to say\, I just had to come home and process\, I loved pretty much every moment. A brave new direction for Star Wars.
